title: Create New Asset in Maintenance System
description: A new pump has been installed. It needs to be created as a new asset in the maintenance management system.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the creation of a new asset.

tasks.description: Enter the asset's details, such as make, model, serial number, and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly populates the asset's master data.

tasks.description: Assign the standard preventative maintenance plan for this type of pump to the new asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent links the correct PM plan to the new asset, which will automatically schedule future maintenance.
